          <title>
            <string language="en">Sun's positions during an equinox</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Positionen des Sonnen während eines 
Äquinoktikums</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les positions du soleil pendant un équinoxe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Posições do sun durante um equinócio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Posizioni del sun durante l'equinozio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θέσεις ήλιου κατά τη διάρκεια ενός equinox</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Posiciones del sun durante un equinoccio</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram illustrates the pattern of Sun's positions during an equinox when rising, setting, and at noon.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">days</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">dials</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">equinox</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">nights</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">noon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">positions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rising</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">setting</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sun</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm veranschaulicht das Muster der 
Positionen des Sonnen während eines Äquinoktikums, beim Steigen und 
stellt und am Mittag ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme illustre la configuration des 
positions du soleil pendant un équinoxe en montant, plaçant, et à 
midi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama ilustra o teste padrão de 
posições do sun durante um equinócio ao levantar-se, ajustando-se, 
e no meio-dia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema illustra il modello delle posizioni 
del sun durante l'equinozio quando aumenta, regolandosi ed al 
mezzogiorno.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα επεξηγεί το το πρότυπο των θέσεων 
του ήλιου κατά τη διάρκεια ενός equinox κατά αύξηση, 
θέτοντας, και το μεσημέρι.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama ilustra el modelo de las posiciones
del sun durante un equinoccio al levantarse, fijando, y al mediodía.</string>
          </description>
